non_compliant.section: By continuing to browse this website, you consent to our use of cookies.
non_compliant.amend: The website should provide a clear and affirmative action through which users can consent to the use of cookies. Continuing to browse the website does not constitute valid consent under the GDPR. The website should also provide users with the option to reject non-essential cookies and still access the website's content.

non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to withdraw consent at any time (Article 7(3))
non_compliant.amend: The website should provide users with the ability to withdraw their consent to the use of cookies as easily as they gave it. This can be achieved through a clear and accessible mechanism, such as a button or link in the cookie banner or within the website's cookie settings.
